### Wave 1 正式分析資料

根據以下描述，篩選納入正式分析的資料：

"Five hundred and twenty-six respondents completed the Wave 1 survey via the Prolific.com platform. Sixteen respondents were excluded for spending too much time on the survey("Duration..in.seconds." -> "Q1T_Page.Submit"). Another nine respondents were excluded for failing the catch question("Q1_CATCH1")."

由於初次嘗試發現分組人數與論文不一致，聯絡論文第一作者Arnout Boot，得知16位被排除的參與者是根據完成"Knowledge Test"的秒數。

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
## check the equality of two data sets
sum(data_factors$Q1T_Page.Submit != data_numeric$Q1T_Page.Submit)
## Boxplot for test duration
boxplot(data_numeric$Q1T_Page.Submit)

wave1_rawdata <- data_numeric %>% 
## exclude the participants who spent more than 999 seconds on the knowledge test
  filter(Q1T_Page.Submit < 999) %>%
## exclude the participants who failed the catch question
  filter(Q1_CATCH1 == 5) %>%
## ## exclude the participants who spent time on the knowledge test longer than 3.29 standardized time
  filter(scale(Q1T_Page.Submit)<3.29)
## How many participants' data are analyzed?
wave1_rawdata %>%
  summarise(N=n())
```


```{r appro "I want to be informed about the coronavirus"ach01}
# information acquisition
  ##轉換嘗試
 #前面pivot_longer是想先轉長表格，放在第一列item的主要變項欄位
 #後面pivot_wider是在同一列其他欄位，因此使用寬表格，將某一變項的同意程度放在同一列。
  #目前尚未理解這樣的程式碼設定不能跑成功的原因?

 wave1_rawdata %>%
  select(ID,Q14_1) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols =starts_with("Q14_") , names_to = "I want to be informed about the coronavirus", values_to = "rating" ) %>%
  group_by(ID) %>%
  summarise(Agree_degree_5 = mean(rating == 5),
            Agree_degree_4 = mean(rating == 4),
            Agree_degree_3 = mean(rating == 3),
            Agree_degree_2 = mean(rating == 2),
            Agree_degree_1 = mean(rating == 1)) %>%
 pivot_wider(names_from = c(Strongly_agree, Somewhat_agree, Neither_agree_nor_disagree, Somewhat_disagree, Strongly_disagree), values_from = score, names_sep = "") %>%
 group_by(Options) %>%
  summarise(Mean = round(mean(Percentage)*100,1)) %>%
  arrange(desc(Options))
```


```{r}

```
Table 5 數據皆成功顯示，但是Rchunk以後，題號錯亂
        表單形式與原作者表單呈現略有不同。
```{r}

 select(ID,Q14_1) %>%
 pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("Q14_"), names_to = "Table5.1_", values_to = "rating") %>% 
 group_by(ID) %>%
 summarise(Table5.1_5_StronglyAgree = mean(rating == 5), 
           Table5.1_4_SomewhatAgree = mean(rating == 4), 
 Table5.1_3_NeitherAgreeNorDisagree = mean(rating == 3), 
        Table5.1_2_SomewhatDisagree = mean(rating == 2),
        Table5.1_1_StronglyDisagree = mean(rating == 1)) %>%
 pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("Table5.1_"), names_to = "Options", values_to = "Percentage") %>%
 group_by(Options) %>% 
 summarise(Mean = round(mean(Percentage)*100,1)) %>% 
 arrange(desc(Options))
```
